cachedPoolMetadata(address).details: These values may or may not have been initialized and may or may not be up to date. `tickSpacing` will be non-zero if they've been initialized.

params.pool: The Uniswap pool for which metadata should be retrieved

returns.gamma0: The pool fee minus the protocol fee on token0, scaled by 1e6
returns.gamma1: The pool fee minus the protocol fee on token1, scaled by 1e6
returns.maxSecondsAgo: The age of the oldest observation in the pool's oracle

params.pool: The pool to use for volatility estimate

feeGrowthGlobals(address,uint256).details: The full array (idx=0,1,2...24) has data that spans *at least* 24 hours

params.idx: The index into the storage array
params.pool: The Uniswap pool for which fee growth should be retrieved

returns.feeGrowthGlobal0X128: Total pool revenue in token0, as of timestamp
returns.feeGrowthGlobal1X128: Total pool revenue in token1, as of timestamp
returns.timestamp: The time at which snapshot was taken and stored

params.pool: The Uniswap pool for which array indices should be fetched

returns.read: The index that was closest to 24 hours old last time `estimate24H` was called
returns.write: The index that was written to last time `estimate24H` was called

params.secondsAgoToEndOfTwap: amount of seconds in the past to end calculating time-weighted average
params.secondsAgoToStartOfTwap: amount of seconds in the past to start calculating time-weighted average

lens(address).details: This is not meant to be used on-chain, and it doesn't contribute to the oracle's knowledge. Please use `estimate24H` instead.

params.pool: The pool to use for volatility estimate

returns.IV: The array of volatility estimates, scaled by 1e18

cacheMetadataFor(address).notice: Updates cached metadata for a Uniswap pool. Must be called at least once in order for volatility to be determined. Should also be called whenever protocol fee changes

cachedPoolMetadata(address).notice: Accesses the most recently stored metadata for a given Uniswap pool

estimate24H(address).notice: Estimates 24-hour implied volatility for a Uniswap pool.

feeGrowthGlobals(address,uint256).notice: Accesses any of the 25 most recently stored fee growth structs

feeGrowthGlobalsIndices(address).notice: Returns indices that the contract will use to access `feeGrowthGlobals`

getHistoricalTwap(address,uint32,uint32).notice: get twap for a specific period of time

lens(address).notice: Provides multiple estimates of IV using all stored `feeGrowthGlobals` entries for `pool`
